Team

About us

We are a dynamic group of passionate PhD scholars united by a deep love for chemistry. Our team serves as a collaborative platform, fostering a vibrant scientific environment for learning, innovation, and growth. Each year, we organize an Intra-Departmental Chemistry Conference,'ChemSymphoria', providing an opportunity for students and researchers to showcase their work, engage in interdisciplinary discussions, and gain insights from renowned speakers. In addition to the conference, we host a range of academic and social events, including Freshers' Meets, Farewell Ceremonies, and various other departmental activities that strengthen our community bonds.Whether you are an aspiring chemist or a seasoned researcher, the ChemPhilic Team offers a wealth of opportunities for professional development, networking, and forging lasting connections. Join us as we explore the endless possibilities of chemical sciences together!
